response: * Darien Angadi (1949–1981), actor and boy soprano

Visiting performers often stayed with the family, which had grown to include four children by 1949. The third of these was Darien Angadi,Massey, pp. 60–61. later a choral soloistBrian Barratt, "The Scrivener: Getting Into Shakespeare", Open Writing, 23 October 2009 (retrieved 23 September 2014). and an actor in Shakespearean productions by Trevor Nunn, Jonathan Miller and Herbert Wise."Shakespeare in Performance: Darien Angadi" , Internet Shakespeare Editions, 30 August 2014 (retrieved 23 September 2014). In his book Azaadi!: Stories and Histories of the Indian Subcontinent After Independence, author and journalist Reginald Massey writes that all the Angadi children were "brilliant and beautiful", with the youngest, Chandrika (or Clare), becoming the first Asian model to appear in Vogue magazine.Massey, p. 60.
Their youngest son Darien Angadi (1949–1981) was a singer and actor, and killed himself in 1981.
* Darien Angadi (1949–1981), British singer and actor, son of Patricia
